Date: Saturday, 8/16/1982
Subject: Eric Northrop failed learning new position
Eric Northrop doesn't seem to make
any progress learning his new position, Second Base.
I would give up this experiment before his hitting suffers.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Monday, 8/25/1982
Subject: Progress of Jack Turner
Dear Sir,
Jack Turner has an ERA of 2.67 at AA Margate Bridges!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
